questions.question_text: "reward" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Something given in return for loyalty or effort
questions.example_sentence: Members receive a reward after reaching a certain spending level.
questions.explanation:
報酬・特典
必須の手数料
支払期限
苦情文書

questions.question_text: "accumulate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To build up gradually over time
questions.example_sentence: Reward points accumulate with each purchase.
questions.explanation:
蓄積する
すぐ使う
急に減らす
現金に換える

questions.question_text: "redeem" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To exchange points for goods or services
questions.example_sentence: Members can redeem points for discounts.
questions.explanation:
交換する
支払いを遅らせる
利息を得る
予約を取り消す

questions.question_text: "tier" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A level or rank within a system
questions.example_sentence: Each tier provides different membership benefits.
questions.explanation:
階層・ランク
返金規定
出荷
請求方法

questions.question_text: "benefit" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: Priority support is one benefit of higher membership tiers.
questions.explanation:
利益・特典
規制
予約制限
配送料
